value.message: Error is logged without stack trace or context in catch block.
value.suggestion: Log error.message and error.stack, and include relevant context such as requestId and input parameters.

value.message: Access control system availability is defaulted to 'allow' (true) if not detected, which may grant permissions in case of detection errors.
value.suggestion: Change fallback to deny by default (false) and require explicit detection before enabling system availability.
